message.raw:
Make PubMultiQueue instances pointers so that they can be explicitly deleted
at the right time during destruction of the plugin class that contains the queue.  This is done to
avoid post-ROS-shutdown calls to `ros::Publisher::publish()` on queued messages.
message.html:

at the right time during destruction of the plugin class that contains the queue. This is done to
avoid post-ROS-shutdown calls to ros::Publisher::publish() on queued messages.
